name: EARTH DEFENSE FORCE 4.1 WINGDIVER THE SHOOTER
description: The story from behind the scenes of EDF 4.1 unravels here. The EDF series is back with new feelings of despair and bug-slaying satisfaction as you fight your way through never-ending swarms of giant insects in a vertical scrolling shoot 'em up!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit Processor: 3 GHz 2 Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7870   / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660　（2GB Model or higher） DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1.8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device Additional Notes: XInput  Controller
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit, Windows 8.1 64bit Windows 10 64bit Processor: 3.2GHz 4Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7970  / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760　（3GB Model or higher） DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1.8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device Additional Notes: XInput  Controller
